original_text: And whoso shall swear by the temple, sweareth by it, and by him that dwelleth therein.
korean_text: 또 성전으로 맹세하는 자는 성전과 그 안에 계신 이로 맹세함이요

sentences.original_text: And whoso shall swear by the temple
and by him that dwelleth therein
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에 거하시는 분을 두고 맹세하는 것이다
